Templatestud.io

Marketo Landing Page & Email Template Developer

ABOUT US

We specialize in the design and development of custom Marketo landing page and email templates. Let us build your Marketo templates, so you can concentrate on becoming great marketers. We will make you look like rockstars with our professionally built templates.



UPLOAD AND START EDITING

Make edits using the Marketo Guided Landing Page editor.

No Developer, or HTML knowledge required. We build templates you can easily edit within Marketo.

WHY USE MARKETO LANDING PAGES

FORMS ELEMENT

Capture leads by using a Marketo form. Edit all of the form settings within Marketo, no need to their API.

SOCIAL/POLL ELEMENT

Have your customers share your landing pages with Marketo's built in social sharing widget.

ANALYTICS

Track and control everything within Marketo. Marketo Munchkin code built in.

HOSTED

Pages are already hosted on Marketo servers. No need to set up or pay for separate hosting.

SCALABLE TEMPLATES

Use the same template for many campaigns. Change tokens or use RTP for dynamic content.

EASY TO EDIT

Use Marketo's easy-to-use editors to change text and images freely.



WHY HIRE US

Responsive Design

60% of Online Traffic on Mobile. 57% of mobile users will abandon your website if it takes more than 3 seconds to load.

Drive Conversions

Increase conversions by providing the best possible user experience no matter what device. Optimized for SEO.

Decrease Costs

Templates are reusuable across many campaigns. Cheaper and faster than using engineering resources for marketing.
